p: In this study, we modeled VC to project DEP in Europe given changes in climate. Throughout this study, we have included DTR in all of our VC calculations. We expanded our previous relative VC model to VC, by including temperature dependent dynamics in the female vector-to-human population ratio ( Liu-Helmersson et al., 2014) for both Ae. aegypti and Ae. albopictus under four projected emission scenarios with higher temporally and spatially resolution over two centuries. We estimated DEP for local dengue transmission, in terms of seasonality, intensity and duration, for Europe and examined ten European metropolitan cities ranging from North to South for the period 1901â€“2099 (for more details see Table S3 in the Supplementary information).
